course_name: Learning Support: Specialist Teaching Area Part A
description: This course is designed to challenge preservice teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. It is designed to give students who intend to teach in secondary schools the philosophies and practices under-lying inclusive practices for children with diverse learning needs in regular schools: curricula, adjustments, classroom organisation and management and assessment and evaluation.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
